<span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Revontulet+Soft+Inc" title="Revontulet Soft Inc">Revontulet Soft Inc</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  完美鋼琴是為你的智能手機設計的鋼琴鍵盤模擬器。使用真實的鋼琴聲音，你可以使用這個應用程序，準確地學習鋼琴。<p>[ 鍵盤 ]<br>  • 支持鋼琴全鍵盤	<br>  • 支持多點觸控<br>  • 支持單排模式；支持雙排模式；雙人對彈模式<br>  • 按鍵力度偵測<br>  • 按鍵寬度調節<br>  • 支持5種鍵盤音效: 大鋼琴, 明亮鋼琴, 八音盒, 風琴, 電子琴, 音樂合成器<br>  • 錄音和迴放；支持MIDI和AAC聲音格式<br>  • 錄音文件分享<br>  • 錄音文件直接設爲手機鈴聲<br>  • 節拍器 </p><p>[ 學習模式 ]<br>  • 落球模式<br>  • 曲譜模式<br>  • 內置70首範例歌曲<br>  • 更多範例音樂下載. 曲庫每周更新 </p><p>[ Multiplayer Piano ]<br>  • Play Piano online with your friends or Strangers around the world.<br>  • Chatting in the room.<br>  • Login with Google Account</p><p>[ 外接USB MIDI鍵盤 ]<br>  • 支持外接USB MIDI鍵盤。可以通過外接MIDI鍵盤來操縱完美鋼琴(比如YAMAHA P105, Roland F-120, Xkey等). <br>  • 註意:此功能僅適用Android 3.1版本以上並支持USB Host功能, 需要USB OTG線連接。</p><p>[ 音色插件支持 ]<br>  • 貝司, 電吉他，木吉他，長笛，薩克斯，電子琴，小提琴，弦音合奏等。<br>  • Download from 'More by developer' link in bottom of this page.</p><p>[ 註意 ]<br>  • 您在使用中有任何問題請與我們聯絡, 我們的電郵: revontuletstudio@gmail.com<br>  • Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PerfectPiano<br>  • Teachers are welcomed to use it on music class. We are excited if this app help.</p><p>還在等什麼？ 讓音樂從你的指尖發出！</p><p>[Some Required Permissions]<br>  • android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO<br>    This permission allow Perfect Piano to record through phone MIC. The use case is when you playing the piano keyboard even sing along, You can record the sound at same time.</p><p>  • android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE<br>  • android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE<br>    These 2 permission is required by Perfect Piano to access external storage(or SD card). The use cases include:<br>      - Save downloaded MIDI file to external storage<br>      - Save MIDI recordings to external storage<br>      - Save Audio recordings to external storage<br>      - Read and Playback recordings from external storage<br>      - Load instrument plugins' sound from external storage</p><p>  • android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS<br>    This permission allow Perfect Piano to set midi/audio recordings as Ringtone.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" ❖❖<p>台灣獨立遊戲開發廠商「雷亞遊戲」iOS平台推出的音樂節奏遊戲《Cytus》，獲得全球熱烈回饋響應，在台灣、美國、日本、韓國、泰國、大陸、港澳地區均締造佳績，現在推出Android版本，讓更多玩家能夠一同享受Cytus的音樂世界。</p><p>Cytus是款音樂節奏遊戲，遊戲方式簡單直覺，隨著歌曲旋律畫面上出現節奏拍點，而玩家要做的就是配合動態掃描線的上下移動抓準時機點擊拍點。遊戲畫面為細膩的手繪風格，同時網羅多位大牌日本樂師陣容參與音樂製作，包括知名音樂遊戲的樂師Tsukasa，BMS同人編曲師Naotyu-、樂師Sta等人，多樣化的曲風、高質感的畫面，是雷亞遊戲的自信力作。</p><p>❖遊戲特色❖<br>-網羅世界知名作曲家收錄100+首原創樂曲，200+種的譜面<br>-9種難度等級，更多挑戰的樂趣<br>-多樣化的曲風從流行音樂到電子音樂，從動感到動人<br>-遊戲方式簡單直覺，感受節奏線在最佳時機Touch拍點<br>-多樣拍點預覽選擇，提供個人化的遊戲呈現<br>-Click Real Drum - 爵士鼓  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Rodrigo+Kolb+Apps" title="Rodrigo Kolb Apps">Rodrigo Kolb Apps</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="br.com.rodrigokolb.realdrum"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJQojEiEKG2JyLmNvbS5yb2RyaWdva29sYi5yZWFsZHJ1bRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  REAL DRUM is a free application for Android that simulates a real drum on your mobile/tablet screen. To play it, just drumming your fingers on the pads of the drums and the sound is played simultaneously. A fun, light and easy to use application. Ideal for those who want to study or play drumming without making much noise or taking up much space. <p>You do not need to know drumming, Real Drum comes with 60 lessons rhythms with tutorial for you to learn to play. Also comes with 24 songs to play along, and still allows you to track songs live. For example, you can give the play a music from your library and accompany its on drums. </p><p>The application has samples of acoustic percussion. Sounds recorded with studio audio quality. But if you want to change the sound of your battery, you can swap crashes and add percussion instruments. You can also change the arrangement of the pads, adjusting your best way to play. </p><p>Features of Real Drum: </p><p>* Multitouch<br>* 13 drum pads<br>* 23 realistic drum sounds<br>* Studio audio quality<br>* Instruments like kick, bass, snare, tom, floor, cymbal, hi-hat, ride, crash, splash, bell, china, stack, block, cowbell, tambourine, timbale, stick, clap and fxs.<br>* 60 examples of rhythms with tutorial mode<br>* 24 backing track songs<br>* Record mode<br>* Complete acoustic drum kit<br>* Works with all screen resolutions - Cell Phones and Tablets (HD Images)<br>* Free</p><p>The app is free, but you can remove all advertisements buying a license! <br>Try the best drums of the Google Play! <br>Made for drummers, percussionists, professional musicians, amateurs or beginners!</p><p>-----------------------</p><p>REAL DRUM是一个免费的应用程序为Android，模拟您的手机/平板电脑屏幕上一个真正的鼓。要播放它，只需敲击着鼓垫你的手指和声音同时播放。一个有趣的，重量轻，易于使用的应用。理想的，谁想要学习或玩击鼓没有发出很大的声响，或占用太多的空间。</p><p>你不需要知道击鼓，鼓实自带的60课的节奏与教程为你学习演奏。还配备了24首歌曲一起玩，而你仍然可以跟踪歌曲居住。举例来说，你可以从你的库给播放音乐，陪它在鼓。</p><p>该应用程序有声的敲击样品。声音记录与录音室音质。但是，如果你想改变你的电池的声音，你可以交换崩溃，并添加打击乐器。您还可以更改的垫的安排，调整你发挥最好的方式。</p><p>真正的鼓的特点：</p><p>*多点触控<br>* 13鼓垫<br>* 23逼真的鼓的声音<br>*工作室音频质量<br>*喜欢踢，重低音，小鼓，嗵，地板，钹，镲，骑，碰撞，飞溅，钟，中国，栈，块，牛铃，铃鼓，timbale，棒，拍手FXS仪器。<br>*使用教程模式60的例子节奏<br>* 24依托轨道歌曲<br>*录制模式<br>*完整的声鼓包<br>*所有的屏幕分辨率作品 - 手机和平板电脑（高清图片）<br>*免费</p><p>该应用程序是免费的，但你可以删除所有广告购买许可证！<br>试试谷歌发挥最好的鼓！<br>做鼓手，打击乐手，职业音乐家，业余爱好者或初学者！</p><p>------<br>This description was generated by Google automatic translator. PC用ソフト「太鼓さん次郎2」のtjaファイルをプレイすることができるアプリです。<p>★★★！！注意！！★★★<br>譜面データはアプリ内に入っていませんので、自分で本体ストレージまたはSDカードに入れてください。<br>譜面データがない場合はプレイするとこができません。</p><p>レビューのところに書いて頂いてるのに目が通せてなく返信できてない方すみません。</p><p>・Androidの端末は多いため全てで動作確認することが出来ません。申し訳ございませんが起動しない端末は非対応とさせて頂きます。</p><p>・「太○さん小○郎」でOFFSET変更したTJAファイルは文字化けしたり曲がズレたり読めない場合があります。<br>・タスクキラー等でバックグラウンドのタスクを削除して起動すると安定することがあります。<br>・TJAファイル、スキンの入手方法のお問い合わせには一切お答えしておりません。ご了承ください。</p><p>■曲の入れ方</p><p>　・初回起動時に本体ストレージまたはSDカードのルートフォルダに「TJA」フォルダが作られます。</p><p>　・「TJA」フォルダの中にジャンルフォルダを作成し、その中にTJAファイルを入れてください。</p><p>　・ジャンルフォルダやフォルダ内にgenre.iniをがない場合は、ジャンルは「未分類」になります。</p><p>　　・android4.4以降でSDカードを指定した場合は必ず/Android/data/com.daijiro.taiko/filesの下に<br>　　TJAファイルを入れてください。それ以外の場所にいれるとハイスコアファイルが書き込めません。</p><p>■スキンの入れ方</p><p>　・スキンは「太鼓さん次郎2」のスキンデータに対応しています。(一部未実装)<br>　 ※2ではない「太鼓さん次郎」のスキンデータには対応していません</p><p>　・theme/default/default.csvを読み込みます。</p><p>　・機種やスキンデータによって動作が重くなることがあるので、注意してください。</p><p>■genre.iniの中身（このファイルがないとジャンルフォルダとして認識されません）<br>　[Genre]<br>　GenreName=ジャンル名<br>　GenreColor=#66cc66<br>　FontColor=#ffffff</p><p>ヘルプ→http://chaos3.iruka.us/daijiro_help/ja/</p><p>例)<br>TJA<br>└ジャンルA<br>　　└genri.ini<br>　　└曲A.tja<br>　　└曲A.ogg<br>└ジャンルB<br>　　└genri.ini<br>　　└曲B.tja<br>　　└曲B.ogg<br>　　└曲C.tja<br>　　└曲C.ogg<br>└theme<br>　　└default<br>　　　　└default.csv<br>　　　　└result.csv<br>　　　　└single.csv<br>　　　　└songselect.csv<br>　　　　└img<br>　　　　└sound</p><p>■今後の予定(時間があまりとれないので気長にお待ちください)</p><p>・譜面分岐(準備中、不具合修正ばかりで全然作れない…) <br>・通りすぎた音符に反応する(太鼓さん次郎は一番近い音符にしか反応しないんで、それを実装…)<br>・SCOREMODE対応(何が違うかから調査)<br>・themeの描画高速化その３<br>・themeの未対応命令の対応<br>・TJC？ なにそれ…<br>・ヘルプを充実させる<br>・HBSCROLL(サンプル譜面ないかな…)<br>・ドコドン修正<br>・Measure-/x ?<br>・BPM40以下で曲がずれる？<br>・BPM変化後にすぐにPLAYERの速度を変える(手を抜いたのバレた…)<br>・サンプル曲入れたほうがいいのかな…<br>・ナビゲーションバーを隠す？<br>・ゲージの上がり方違う？（誰か教えて…)<br>・韓国語の翻訳<br>・太鼓の画像を変えれるようにする<br>・ios作っても審査通らないかな…</p><p>・他のゲームを作成中</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Dynamix  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=C4+Cat" title="C4 Cat">C4 Cat</a>   <span Dynamix介紹<br>C4Cat推出的首款遊戲Dynamix，是一款三重下落式音樂手機遊戲。與一般下落式音樂遊戲不同，Dynamix分為左、中、右3個下落方向的區域，每個區域作為一個樂器的音軌。三區的設計令遊戲更具變化，為遊戲提供更有趣和更高難度的挑戰。另外，同時處理三個音軌也令玩家有親身演奏整首音樂的臨場感，加強音樂節拍。<p>不同遊玩模式不同挑戰<br>多種音符包括TAP，SLIDE，HOLD，對應點擊，拖動，長按等各種互動方式，豐富遊戲內容。<br>未來更將設有附助性質的鏡向譜面，傳說中的「拉閘」- 扣血模式，以及音符闊度縮減等各種特殊遊玩模式，更可同時多開啟不同模式以配搭出完全不同的遊戲體驗。</p><p>原創音樂與譜面<br>現收錄超過30首由香港作曲家親自打造的原創音樂，音樂風格目前偏向電子音樂為主包括Trancecore、Hardcore、Glitch、Oriental、Chiptune 等、未來更新將會增加更多多元化的音樂風格包括Dubstep、和式電音、Psytrance、Breakbeat等。遊戲內包含過百個譜面，由入門的Basic級漸進至資深玩家也不感乏味的Hard級、什至超越Hard的自定義超難度譜面”Mega”、”Giga”級。<br>-------------------------------<br>《Dynamix》特色：<br>★一條軌對應一個樂器，強化演奏樂器的感覺<br>★特別玩法，加強節奏感<br>★難度變化更大，玩家可輕鬆由淺入深<br>★模仿街機感覺, 街機難度<br>-------------------------------<br>官方網址: http://dynamix.c4-cat.com<br>C4CAT官方專頁: http://fb.me/c4cats<br>Dynamix官方專頁: http://fb.me/c4cat.dynamix<br>遊戲Trailer: class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=nullapp" title="nullapp">nullapp</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.nullapp.minipiano"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5udWxsYXBwLm1pbmlwaWFubxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  玩你的眼睛关闭，愚弄你的朋友！ <p>迷你钢琴是钢琴演奏最简单的方法 - 你可以发挥你的眼睛闭上。只需轻点上的任意位置的钢琴演奏下一个音符或票据中的歌曲。所有您需要做的是处理的时机。您可以播放快或慢。 </p><p>你甚至可以学习如何玩酷和流行的歌曲！ </p><p>迷你钢琴都配有免费的歌曲，如：奇异恩典，云雀，糟糕的罗曼史，哈利路亚，只要给我一个理由，麻木了，让她去，尝试等等。 </p><p>从不同的艺术家演奏的歌曲。 </p><p>这很有趣，这是神奇的，它是免费的！</p><p>--------------------</p><p>Play with your eyes closed and fool your friends!</p><p>Mini Piano is the easiest way to play piano - you can play with your eyes closed. Just tap anywhere on the piano to play the next note or notes in the song. All you have to do is to handle the timing. data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  滑音達人自2012年12月第壹波上架後，至今已發布5個版本，累積超越3000萬用戶，官方在此向各位支持滑音達人音樂遊戲的粉絲們致敬。<p>本作是滑音達人第五波，我們每壹個版本都在進步，如果妳之前玩過滑音達人的作品，應該不陌生，10W用戶點評最有FEELING的音樂觸控遊戲，來試試吧，本產品持續免費，無內置計費點，歡迎下載體驗。</p><p>《滑音達人 Touch Music》是壹款音樂節拍類遊戲。如果妳曾經玩過勁樂團，那麽這款遊戲的玩法跟它有點類似。遊戲就是考驗玩家的反應和操作能力，手指彈奏音符，看妳的準確度和得分有多高吧。</p><p>遊戲中有壹個新的概念--“觸後形態”，當壹個節拍點被玩家擊中後會轉入特定的“觸後形態”，從而樂曲的音色和情緒在視覺和觸感上得到的延伸。</p><p>獨創的加速節拍點讓音樂的節奏更有層次，對節奏的辨識更加清晰可見。<br>戲中具有新式的滑動觸控，充分利用了觸摸屏的優勢而帶來了傳統遊戲設備做不到的觸控體驗。<br>遊戲中還實驗性的結合了手機振動的功能，為特定的節拍點附加了振動因子，當玩家擊中帶有振動因子的節拍點時就會感覺到不同程度的震動。<br>友情提示，手機的自帶揚聲器性能有限，戴耳機玩體驗更佳。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS52ZXJzaW9uMDAuUGlhbm9fdnNfWm9tYmllcxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  感謝台灣，香港玩家熱情的口碑推薦，鋼琴打殭屍 iOS 版只花非常少的廣告費用，輕輕鬆鬆就爬到遊戲總榜前5名，超感謝你們的支持～(‵▽′) <br><p><br>不管你喜不喜歡玩遊戲，鋼琴打殭屍都是一個值得讓你長久保留在手機裡的App，因為： <br>◆ Google Play目前最佳世界名曲之鋼琴音還原，與時下一般鋼琴App有著明顯的差別 <br>◆ 在經典的打殭屍玩法上增加了許多有趣的新玩法，巧妙結合了音樂遊戲與打殭屍的雙重樂趣 <br>◆ 精緻可愛又滑稽的遊戲畫面，Google Play已大量充斥著粗製濫造的App，下載當天就可能被刪除 <br></p><p>注意：少數防毒軟體會誤判鋼琴打殭屍有毒，這是因為我們遊戲有加密的設定，請玩家安心遊玩～</p><p>◆ 鋼琴打殭屍已持續3周在多個國家遊戲總榜 Top 10 <br>◆ 鋼琴打殭屍已持續5周在多個國家遊戲總榜 Top 20 <br>◆ 鋼琴打殭屍已持續8周在免費音樂遊戲排行榜第1名在台灣App Store <br>◆ 在13個國家（包括台灣，香港，澳門，澳洲，日本，中國等等）被選為音樂遊戲精品項目的 “時下熱門” </p><p><br>電玩爆爆主播婕翎推薦影片： <br>http://youtu.be/cVYDWEt2PrI <br>達人試玩影片： <br>http://youtu.be/iRtgMoyEQgo <br>巴哈姆特電玩瘋試玩影片： <br>http://youtu.be/GKBJu9Kb8tg <br></p><p><br>----------------</p><p>長久以來，因為人類的武器過於強大，所有殭屍幾乎瀕臨滅絕 <br>最近出現一種突變的殭屍，長相可愛討喜，讓人們卸下心房 <br>等它靠近你時，才會露出本性，吃掉你！ <br>不管使用任何槍砲彈藥等先進武器都無法對它們造成傷害 <br>無敵的殭屍，以極快的速度大量出現 <br>整個世界幾乎只剩下殭屍了！ </p><p>在人類幾乎已經絕望的同時 <br>偶然間，在一間廢棄的教堂內發現了一架擁有神祕力量的鋼琴 <br>此鋼琴的聲音竟然能秒殺它們！ <br>人們因此重新燃起了希望 </p><p><br>---------------- </p><p>打殭屍手冊： </p><p>1. 當殭屍靠近並準備攻擊你時，它會變得興奮，身體會發光，眼睛變成白色，但是疏於防備，此時請彈奏和殭屍同色的琴鍵，打趴它！ </p><p>2. 值得注意的是，如果不能彈奏正確的琴鍵的話…殭屍們會停下腳步取笑你： <br>哈…你這個笨蛋，打不到我… </p><p>3. 最重要的是，“彈快一點！”，因為殭屍不管你彈的速度是否正確，只要彈奏的琴鍵正確即可打趴它們 </p><p>4. 收集殭屍的血液可以增加你的時間上限，最大可以增加到90秒！ </p><p>5. 紫色的殭屍需彈奏 “無形的琴鍵” 才能擊打趴</p><p>6. 不要忽略了STORE中販賣的強力道具 </p><p><br>---------------- </p><p>遊戲介紹： </p><p>這是個彈鋼琴打殭屍的音樂遊戲 <br>10秒鐘即可輕易上手，但是耐玩度高，顛覆了一般音樂遊戲的規則，節奏感不佳的人也能獲得相同的樂趣 <br>遊戲中可輕易彈奏雙手或四手聯彈的專業版本之世界名曲（貝多芬、莫扎特、柴可夫斯基、帕赫貝爾（ “卡農” 的作者）） </p><p>為了追求高分，為了彈完一首歌曲，你需儘快彈奏正確琴鍵打趴更多殭屍，不需考慮歌曲本來的節奏 <br>你也可以隨意以各種速度來彈奏，隨意更改歌曲的節奏，很容易讓朋友的目光都集中到你身上 </p><p>隨著打趴殭屍數量的增加，你可以累積殭屍的血液，增加每次遊戲時間的上限 <br>讓你可以打趴更多殭屍獲得更高分，彈奏更完整的歌曲旋律 <br>分數越高，還可以獲得不同階級的皇冠殭屍頭像 <br>除此之外累積一定量的殭屍血液時還會解鎖新的歌曲 </p><p><br>遊戲中STORE販賣的道具除了也可幫助你獲得更高分，彈奏更完整的歌曲以外，還會增加遊戲的趣味性 <br>例如： <br>彩色音符：可以讓你減少彈錯旋律的機會 <br>激光燈泡：可以對大量殭屍染色， 此時你只要快速點擊同一個琴鍵，不需思考，即可快速打殭屍 </p><p><br>以 ”打趴更多殭屍獲得高分” 、 ”擊敗Facebook朋友及全世界玩家” 、 ”完整彈奏所有歌曲” 為目標努力吧！ </p><p><br>提示：建議外接耳機或雙聲道喇叭，可獲得更佳的遊戲體驗 《极品钢琴》是一款情趣独到的绿色音乐游戏。游戏方式是当音符下降到琴键上方的水平线的时候，按下对应琴键，便可弹奏出美妙动听的音乐。等级考试、榜单挑战、网友对战等独特的玩法，以及覆盖了各种社交媒体的极品钢琴更能让你与你的好友开启乐趣无穷的挑战比拼，互动体验，更多参与，更多快乐！极品钢琴，好玩有趣的手机钢琴游戏。 <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=SEVEN+CAT+GAMES" title="SEVEN CAT GAMES">SEVEN CAT GAMES</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Tips：看到很多朋友的留言說很好玩，我們很開心能與大家分享這個作品。我們的歌曲都是精雕細琢精選而出，背景和效果動感十足，這也耗費了大量的精力，所以曲庫的更新不會那麽快。希望大家繼續支持《滑音達人》，我們堅信我們將是PLAY市場上最棒的音樂遊戲。<p>我們已經推出了滑音達人第五波啦。全新的13支歌曲陪你High翻天，還是完全免費的哦。</p><p><br>TIPS：<br>遊戲檔案不小喔，有39M，有13個好聽的音樂可以隨時玩，每個音樂有3種難度可以選擇。<br>建議到有WIFI的地方下載，本遊戲完全免費，沒有內購，遊戲過程中無廣告。誠意奉獻，請暢玩。</p><p>-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------</p><p>《滑音達人 Touch Music》是壹款音樂節拍類遊戲。如果妳曾經玩過勁樂團，那麽這款遊戲的玩法跟它有點類似。遊戲就是考驗玩家的反應和操作能力，手指彈奏音符，看妳的准確度和得分有多高吧。<br>遊戲中有壹個新的概念--“觸後形態”，當壹個節拍點被玩家擊中後會轉入特定的“觸後形態”，從而樂曲的音色和情緒在視覺和觸感上得到的延伸。 </p><p>獨創的加速節拍點讓音樂的節奏更有層次，對節奏的辨識更加清晰可見。 </p><p>戲中具有新式的滑動觸控，充分利用了觸摸屏的優勢而帶來了傳統遊戲設備做不到的觸控體驗。 </p><p>遊戲中還實驗性的結合了手機振動的功能，爲特定的節拍點附加了振動因子，當玩家擊中帶有振動因子的節拍點時就會感覺到不同程度的震動。 </p><p>友情提示，手機的自帶揚聲器性能有限，戴耳機玩體驗更佳。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.homesky123.iplaypiano" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.homesky123.iplaypiano" title="愛玩鋼琴"> 77.    愛玩鋼琴  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=HOMESKY" title="HOMESKY">HOMESKY</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.homesky123.iplaypiano"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5ob21lc2t5MTIzLmlwbGF5cGlhbm8QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  《愛玩鋼琴》是壹款專門為學習鋼琴的初學者量身訂制的虛擬鋼琴應用程式，采用更加標準逼真的音色庫，鋼琴音色上完勝其它鋼琴應用。鍵盤模式完美模擬真實鋼琴，還有更好玩的遊戲模式，內置上百首國內外經典鋼琴曲。 <br>新增的演奏模式更是添加200多首流行歌曲和鋼琴曲，而且也支持自己導入MIDI歌曲，讓鋼琴更好玩。 <br>特點： <br>1、鋼琴88個琴鍵全鍵盤自由彈奏、演奏模式、試聽欣賞模式、遊戲模式與排行榜，MIDI音樂支持； <br>2，高音質大鋼琴聲音，88個琴鍵，可隨意調節鍵盤大小; <br>3，演奏模式區分左右手，用護只需彈奏右手，左手伴奏由軟件自動彈奏; <br>5、包括華語、英文、日韓等流行歌曲，還有動漫遊戲音樂、兒童音樂和經典鋼琴曲等，定期添加； <br>6，支持多點觸控; <br>7，支持鍵盤滑鍵; <br>8，支持單排鍵盤和雙排鍵盤; <br>9，彈奏錄音功能; <br>10，如果您想要練習什麼歌曲，也可以郵件告訴我們！ <p>用《愛玩鋼琴》妳既可以自由彈奏鍵盤，也可以欣賞好聽的鋼琴曲和歌曲，還可以用遊戲模式和演奏模式來學習鋼琴，多首鋼琴名曲和高音質鋼琴聲音的結合，即使妳不會彈鋼琴也能成為鋼琴大師，彈奏出美妙的樂曲。</p> <span Bạn tìm kiếm một game di dộng online có một thế giới đầy âm nhạc và cơ hội gặp gỡ bạn bè khắp mọi miền đất nước.</p><p>Bạn muốn một nơi có phong cách trẻ trung hơn, nhộn nhịp hơn, sành điệu hơn? Một nơi mà có thể khẳng định được tài năng, đẳng cấp cùng dấu ấn của riêng bạn?</p><p>Không cần phải tìm kiếm đâu xa, TeaMobi xin giới thiệu một sản phẩm mới, game di động 3D thuần Việt đầu tiên kết hợp giữa âm nhạc, vũ đạo và mạng xã hội : Avatar Musik. </p><p>Trong Avatar Musik, thành phố sẽ trở nên lung linh, đẹp mắt hơn với thiết kế 3D cùng màu sắc trẻ trung, tươi sáng nhưng không kém phần thân thiện. Thế giới Avatar Musik đông đảo bạn bè, với đủ mọi độ tuổi, tính cách từ mọi miền đất nước vì thế bạn sẽ thoải mái thể hiện cá tính duy nhất của bản thân mình cùng mọi người qua các phong cách thời trang độc đáo, những hành động ngộ nghĩnh. Với thiết kế nhân vật bắt mắt, cùng nhiều bộ quần áo thời trang, kiểu tóc hợp mốt, cho bạn thỏa sức phối hợp và thể hiện sự sáng tạo cá tính bản thân. </p><p>Tiếp đó hãy cùng tự tin khoe kỹ năng điêu luyện của mình trong những bản nhạc đầy sôi động, thử thách độ nhanh nhạy của những ngón tay cùng bạn bè. Hoặc bạn cũng có thể bất chợt gặp được một người bạn mới hợp ý đang thơ thẩn trong công viên thì sao nào. Ngoài ra bạn còn có thể thoải mái giao lưu với bạn bè bằng những tính năng tương tác thú vị giữa người chơi với nhau. Với Avatar Musik, khoảng cách không còn là nỗi bận tâm.</p><p>Cập nhật phiên bản 0.3.3:<br>- Fix lỗi thanh nhiệp điệu chạy không đúng nhạc, khó canh Perfect.<br>- Fix lỗi không tạo được phòng nhảy đôi.<br>- Fix lỗi hiển thị sai phòng đôi thành phòng đơn.<br>- Chức năng quay số hoàn toàn mới.<br>- Chức năng tìm kiếm bạn.<br>- Tương tác với item động.<br>- Chế độ download toàn bộ hoặc từng bài href="/store/apps/details?id=com.perfectpiano.keyborad.cello" title="Cello Sound Plugin"> 101.    Cello Sound Plugin  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Revontulet+Soft+Inc" title="Revontulet Soft Inc">Revontulet Soft Inc</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.perfectpiano.keyborad.cello"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5wZXJmZWN0cGlhbm8ua2V5Ym9yYWQuY2VsbG8QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ===========================<br>= This is a Sound Plugin for App: Walk Band and Perfect Piano.  It can't run alone!<br>= Please install Walk Band or Perfect Piano first from Google Play to use this plugin.  <br>===========================<br>Walk Band: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gamestar.pianoperfect<br>Perfect Piano: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gamestar.perfectpiano<p>Usage: </p><p>1. Enter Keyboards Screen of Walk Band(Perfect Piano)</p><p>2. Select switch instrument icon. </p><p>3. This new instrument icon will automatic show. 猜歌达人是一款社交类出歌与猜歌的应用，用户可以利用手机中的音乐互相出歌与猜歌，也可以自己猜手机中的歌曲，用户出歌后，应用会为用户的歌单生成一个移动网页（在分享页面可以看到网址），好友也可以在浏览器中猜歌。<p>玩法介绍：<br>1.在线猜歌<br>    在网络较好的环境中时，你可以选择一种喜欢或擅长的音乐类型，在线与歌友PK歌单，每个歌单后都有一个积分奖励和歌友的排名，你可以清楚的了解你的猜歌能力，如果你觉得歌单不错，您可以将歌单分享给好友，邀请你的好友比试一下谁才是真正的猜歌达人<br>2.本地猜歌<br>     当你在没有wifi的环境中时，如坐公交、地铁或等人的时候，你可以使用本地猜歌，来猜猜你手机的歌曲，看看你对你的歌曲有多了解。<br>3.在线出歌<br>     如果你觉得猜歌还不过瘾的话，来试试出歌吧，你可以选择将手机中的5首音乐，每首随即截取10秒，制作成一个歌单，应用马上会为你的歌单生成一个移动网页，你可以轻松将网页链接分享至新浪微博、腾讯微博和人人网，不论你的好友是使用安卓手机，苹果手机，平板电脑，还是普通电脑，都可以轻松访问你的歌单，来猜你出的歌。<br>4. 竞技猜歌<br>    1）限时竞技模式：50秒内猜对歌最多<br>    2）限数竞技模式：猜对5首歌用时最少<br> 还等什么，赶快下载猜歌达人，了解更多的音乐，成为真正的音乐达人。</p><p>———— [ 以下是相关关键词 ] ————<br>音乐 猜歌 游戏 K歌 达人 你唱我猜 唱吧 社交 陌陌 交友 新浪 腾讯 微博 豆瓣 人人 微信 music game KTV 酷狗 QQ 酷我 音乐英雄 音乐工坊</p><p></p> <span Tap multiple cubes on beat or use the sync button to make them synchronize.  I recently added the option to swipe multiple cubes to start beats. You should be able to start beats by just tapping the cube without the need to swipe. Please email me if the app is not working as you expect and I will see what I can do to fix this. info@buttonbeats.com   This cube has some of the most pumping dubstep beats.  ButtonBass.com was launched in august of 2007 by me, Jason. I had a set of music samples I wanted to mix up and I didn't have any software available so I made a program to mix them up. My friend came over and was playing the program for over an hour. So I thought It would be cool to upload it to the internet. So I bought the ButtonBeats.com domain name and uploaded a few different programs I made. A short time later I made the piano. I put the song Jingle Bells up to play on the piano. Then people began to submit many songs for the piano. After about a year I got my friend Everett involved in producing the site and getting the name out there. From there we had a friend Ariel that made music. Ariel, Everett and I spent many afternoons recording sound samples,editing the samples, designing ui, making beats, ordering beats, designing t shirts, stickers, programming and barbecuing. Within the last year we brought Stephan on board. He has skinned the whole site with a new look this summer and has other good ideas in the works right now. Between the four of us, we have the website generating over two million views a month. The site is popular all over the world and continues to grow. class="card-click-target" data-server-cookie="CAIaFgoUEhIKDGFpci5Qb3BzY2VuZRABGAM=" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.Popscene" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="Popscene (Music Industry Sim)" class="cover-image" data-cover-large="https://lh5.ggpht.com/BTWXviH4mwGQYfzJBlaAGeDUKXCi3kTWEG26TNEwSAyYEe5mloPHxoqQ5tvsQDPnqQ=w340-rw" data-cover-small="https://lh5.ggpht.com/BTWXviH4mwGQYfzJBlaAGeDUKXCi3kTWEG26TNEwSAyYEe5mloPHxoqQ5tvsQDPnqQ=w170-rw" class="preordered-label">已預購</span> </span> <span class="preview-overlay-container" data-docid="air.Popscene">  </span>  </a>  </div> <div class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.Popscene" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.Popscene" title="Popscene (Music Industry Sim)"> 140.    Popscene (Music Industry Sim)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=MDickie" title="MDickie">MDickie</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.Popscene"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFgoUEhIKDGFpci5Qb3BzY2VuZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Bring your MP3 collection to life with animated performances as you embark on a career in music! Form your own band by recruiting talent from over 150 artists across 6 unique labels, or enjoy creating your own stars with the editor. Then record hits that will top the charts and take them on the road to over 20 different venues - inc authentic reviews and news reports that tell a story of a band. Like "A Rockstar At My Hamster" for the 21st century, Popscene leaves no stone unturned to do for the music biz what Wrestling Revolution did for wrestling! The game is free to download, with the option to purchase a "backstage pass" for even more content.<p>* Please note that the MP3 player function may not be compatible with some devices. If this affects you, consider turning off MP3 music in the options.</p><p>PLAYING GUIDE:<br>Popscene divides the music making process into entertainment (represented by stars) and artistry (represented by hearts). As in real life, popular music is more likely to shoot up the charts and draw fans - but without substance, the success may be short-lived. Each of the game's many artists has the following attributes that influence this process:</p><p>- POPULARITY is the artist's ability to draw fans to entertaining content.<br>- REPUTATION is their ability to draw fans to artistic content.<br>- PERFORMANCE is their ability to perform entertaining songs live.<br>- TALENT is their ability to perform artistic songs live.<br>- PRODUCTION is their ability to compose entertaining music.<br>- WRITING is their ability to compose artistic music.<br>- HAPPINESS is the pleasure they currently get from their work.<br>- ATTITUDE indicates how likely they are to either contribute or cause trouble.</p><p>This is a band management sim, and as a band manager it is your job to recruit stars from the music biz. Each week, depending on the size of your team and their collective attitude, new songs may be recorded. Each member of the team contributes their score to a new song, and whoever scores the highest will be credited with making it. Members who are dedicated backstage staff will contribute twice instead of once - inc the chances of a good song being written.</p><p>Once songs exist, it is the on-stage performers who must bring it to life. As with writing, each band member on stage contributes their score and the highest determines how well the song was received in each category. This time, it is the "frontman" who gets to contribute twice instead of once - so consider who is at the forefront.</p><p>The overall rating for a show is the average of all the songs performed - albeit slightly more generous so that perfection is not required. This is also true of album reviews. A 5-star performance may consist of consistent 4-star contributions. Reviews are where your performances feed back into the stats that produced them, because each attribute will rise or fall to reflect what just happened.</p><p>When booking venues, you must consider how much it will cost versus how much you are likely to recoup. Tickets are sold at $5 per song so it depends how long your set is. You will receive a percentage of this revenue, and must then use that to pay your employees and any other expenses. Singles are sold at $1 each whereas albums are sold at $1 per song for a maximum of $10 (cha-ching!). If you have a week of inactivity, you may find that you make a loss because of the expenses of your lifestyle (which reflects your wealth). On the independent scene, you take a larger chunk of lower revenue so you will have to migrate to a major label eventually.</p><p>I regret there is more to this game than I could ever explain here, so enjoy figuring some things out for yourself! Or join the debate over at Facebook to have any curious questions answered:<br>www.facebook.com/MDickieFans</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.Popscene" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=air.Popscene" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 3.8 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 76.77243232727051%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag Touch Music OL  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Youki.Hyde" title="Youki.Hyde">Youki.Hyde</a> Music》是壹款音樂節拍類遊戲。<p>獨創的加速節拍點讓音樂的節奏更有層次，對節奏的辨識更加清晰可見。<br>遊戲中具有新式的滑動觸控，充分利用了觸摸屏的優勢而帶來了傳統遊戲設備做不到的觸控體驗。<br>遊戲中還實驗性的結合了手機振動的功能，爲特定的節拍點附加了振動因子，當玩家擊中帶有振動因子的節拍點時就會感覺到不同程度的震動。</p><p>友情提示，手機的自帶揚聲器性能有限，戴耳機玩體驗更佳。</p><p></p> ButtonBeats Dubstep Balls  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=ButtonBeats" title="ButtonBeats">ButtonBeats</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.DroidBall"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFwoVEhMKDWFpci5Ecm9pZEJhbGwQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  These are the ButtonBeats Dubstep Balls.  This is a follow up to the popular Buttonbeats Dubstep Cube! I'm sure some of you have been waiting for this! Enjoy.  Each of the spheres is a heart pounding dubstep beat.  Mix 3 or four beats together to make a song!   ButtonBeats.com was launched in august of 2007 by me, Jason. I had a set of music samples I wanted to mix up and I didn't have any software available so I made a program to mix them up. My friend came over and was playing the program for over an hour. So I thought It would be cool to upload it to the internet. So I bought the ButtonBeats.com domain name and uploaded a few different programs I made. A short time later I made the piano. I put the song Jingle Bells up to play on the piano. Then people began to submit many songs for the piano. After about a year I got my friend Everett involved in producing the site and getting the name out there. From there we had a friend Ariel that made music. Ariel, Everett and I spent many afternoons recording sound samples,editing the samples, designing ui, making beats, ordering beats, designing t shirts, stickers, programming and barbecuing. Within the last year we brought Stephan on board. He has skinned the whole site with a new look this summer and has other good ideas in the works right now. Between the four of us, we have the website generating over two million views a month. The site is popular all over the world and continues to grow. If you do not know the style, Reggaeton is a music genre which has its roots in Latin and Caribbean music. Its sound derived from the Reggae en Español from Panama. After its mainstream exposure in 2004, it spread to North American, European, Asian and African audiences. </p><p>This app is the most full Reggaeton Drum Pads on the Google Play. The game reveals the genesis of the fantasy-land of Hyrule, the origin of the Triforce, and the tale of the first exploits of Princess Zelda and the heroic adventurer Link.</p><p>Link is given the Fairy Ocarina near the beginning of the game, which is later replaced by the Ocarina of Time, given to him by Princess Zelda. Throughout the game, Link learns twelve melodies that allow him to solve various puzzles and teleport to previously visited locations in the game.</p><p>The button layout of the Nintendo 64 controller resembles the holes of the ocarinas in the game,  and players must learn to play several songs to complete the game. <div class="description">  貓聽起來應用程序是一個性格開朗的娛樂所有你家的居民<p>貓的聲音給你，你的家人和貓等動物的娛樂。您可以使用貓的聲音應用程序到您的狗追你，如果你一個貓玩具為您的狗。或者你可以用它來招待孩子們，讓他們使用這個免費的貓聲卡的應用程序的貓彈鋼琴。</p><p>這些貓的聲音效果是娛樂，你可以玩匹配的貓的聲音的樂趣。貓的聲音是娛樂這兩個孩子和成人，你可以使用cat聲音有樂趣兩者。</p><p>大多數人都會同意，貓是很可愛，可愛的寵物。他們的樣子，他們的行為方式和說話是貓愛好者最抓取的事情之一。對於那些誰希望有一隻貓，但他們不能因為一些原因，有可能有這種喜悅在家裡的至少一部分。這對於其能夠發出貓的聲音電話中創建的應用程序。這只是夢幻般的應用程序，它應該是在我們的大多數手機。讓我們來看看為什麼。</p><p>這種貓的聲音為Android手機僅創建尚未申請，但希望這將有可能把它在其他手機很快。貓音板包括那些聲音供您娛樂：小狗小貓餓貓打呼嚕的小貓咪喵瘋貓逗貓開心貓傻貓咆哮怒吼貓小貓貓的聲音吆喝著貓的貓懇求，要求食品貓打架老化貓的聲音貓要求食品貓雙喵小貓聲音。可以有很多可能性的貓的聲音超過25。這可能是大多數貓的主人還沒有聽說過所有可能的貓的聲音，在現實中。它現在可以通過電話來完成。也有簡單和獨特的貓的喵喵包括在內。但是，儘管你的Andr​​oid手機可以變得更可愛的貓，憤怒的貓或只是一隻餓貓。它可以反映任何貓的聲音。它的工作原理很簡單。</p><p>你只需要按下一個按鈕，並選擇其中的貓的聲音，你想聽到的。其實這是沒有必要，甚至觸摸屏的。你可以滾手機從左至右或任何其他方，並聽取如何貓的聲音正在發生變化。它是可以控制的聲音和基本上一切。</p><p>貓的聲音可以給大家一個偉大的娛樂，它可以通過多種方式使用。比如正好有一個可能性聽到一個可愛的聲音，放鬆，玩得開心，或者教你的寵物一個很好的行為。貓的聲音可能是也為您的通話旋律。然後每次調用將受到歡迎和積極。此外，它是為孩子們讓他們高興非常好的方式。</p><p>貓的聲音可以是一個很好的娛樂不僅為人們也為寵物。如何貓或狗會表現得聽例如可愛的貓的聲音，他們看不到？他們可能會開始搜索該貓或將開始做同樣的或者也許他們會以其他方式馬厩回應。找出最好的方法是嘗試。另一種方式來使用它是為了讓你的寵物通過移動電話來改變聲音。此外，它可以是有用的寵物主人，以了解如何滿足一個真正的憤怒貓當寵物會有什麼反應。他會生氣呢？如果應用程序將顯示是的，它是更好地嘗試避免該次會議。</p><p>所有的貓的聲音的應用程序提供了在現實和歡快。所有你需要做的就是下載應用程序，打開它，並有你想要隨時隨地樂趣。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Lần đầu tiên tại Việt Nam, người yêu game vũ đạo có thể trải nghiệm tính năng tìm kiếm bạn cùng chơi ở gần ngay trong game (tương tự tính năng Nearby trên các OTT) cũng như rảnh tay chat voice cùng bạn bè.<br> <br>Sở hữu một kho đồ thời trang ấn tượng, hiệu ứng đẹp mắt, Au 3D sẽ là thế giới thú vị, là nơi thể hiện cá tính. Kết bạn không giới hạn – Tìm bạn cùng chơi game xung quanh qua Nearby, mời bạn bè Facebook cùng chơi game;<br>4. Thử vận may – rinh đồ HOT, mở sao để tìm kiếm items cao cấp<br>5. Thể hiện cá tính bằng nhiều kiểu showtime và mở màn ván nhảy khác nhau, có thể mua trong shop hoặc kiếm thông qua các hoạt động ingame;<br>7. Khu giao lưu đông đúc sống động, không giới hạn người tham gia, tương tác với những người chơi khác bằng các cử chỉ không đụng hàng;<br>8. Anda akan diberikan 3 alat bantu untuk bermain game tebak lagu, yaitu 50:50 akan menghilangkan 2 jawaban yang salah! Skip, jika anda benar-benar tidak tahu judul lagu tersebut, dan timer jika anda ingin menambah waktu selama 15 detik dalam satu permainan.</p><p>3. Yang perlu diperhatikan, anda hanya boleh menggunakan 50:50 sekali dalam 1 soal, dan menggunakan sekali timer dalam 1 permainan.</p><p>Biar lebih seru, game ini sudah terintegrasi dengan google play leaderboards jadi kamu bisa bersaing score dengan pemain lain. Selain itu juga terdapat ratusan lagu yang siap membuatmu bingung dan harus mencoba mengingat-ngingat judulnya! Each game provides cutting edge 3D graphics, missions, unique bonus games and ear-splitting riffs. </p><p>* PINBALL ROCKS: Jump into our FREE rock club themed table, and challenge yourself with 20+ missions and 3 bonus games. Pinball Rocks features an awesome soundtrack along with in-game voiceovers from SiriusXM's Zeena Koda. Hyper-realistic pinball gameplay set to a backdrop inspired by the band's latest head-banging masterpiece, World Painted Blood. Includes music, original voice recordings from singer/bassist Tom Araya, guitar shredding mini-games, and a pinball environment straight out of your worst nightmare. Play it LOUD! </p><p>ALL GAMES FEATURE: </p><p>- Hyper-realistic physics engine <br>- Stunning 3D original art with extreme attention to detail <br>- Multiple camera angles: including Stereoscopic 3D-perspective, full table and smart cam <br>- In-Game store featuring all songs in the game with a simple one-click purchase option to own the tracks and download to your music library, along with various add-on "cheats" to enhance gameplay. <br>- Original voiceovers <br>- Rhythm mini-games </p><p>Pinball Rocks HD dials it up to 11 and is the biggest, baddest rock infused game ever. </div>  <div class="description">  你是“狗”或“貓”的人嗎？如果你的回答是“貓人”，這個程序是為你的權利。<br>搞笑的，可怕的，出乎意料的是，調皮，大聲或幾乎耳語：貓可以在許多方面說喵。貓能吼像老虎或者喵作為一個小的小可愛的貓。的叫聲是用於不同的目的等不同。例如，對於打呼嚕，懇求，打，顯示出飢餓等大多數人喜歡貓，他們是可愛的，可愛的，但在同一時間獨立，聰明的動物。<br>如果你是貓驚訝這個頑皮的貓的聲音的應用程序是最適合你和你的家人和寵物。玩這些貓的聲音，讓你的狗來追你。或招待你的孩子，讓他們玩貓鋼琴，採用不同的貓從這個貓的聲音聽起來應用程序。或者，你猜怎麼著貓的聲音意味著什麼。這實在是娛樂為：孩子和成人。如果你總是想保持貓在家裡，但它是不可能的，由於一些特殊原因，這個應用程序可以幫助你。通過玩貓的聲音，你可以有有這家寵物在家裡的快樂的至少一部分。正如你可以看到這是一個夢幻般的應用程序有多個使用的可能性。<br>你能理解你的貓想告訴你什麼？它是餓貓打呼嚕的小貓咪瘋貓逗砍伐貓快樂的貓傻貓的轟鳴聲虎貓吼你的貓懇求貓乞討食物或乾脆戰鬥貓嗎？有這麼多不同的聲音傾斜，這很可能是真實的，大部分貓的主人還沒有聽說過他們。這種貓的聲音應用程序的手機可以幫助在這種情況下。它包含了非常簡單的，並在同一時間獨特貓叫聲。因此，你的手機可以成為一個可愛的貓，憤怒的貓，貓傻或者只是很餓討飯貓。它可以模仿這麼多貓的聲音。它也很容易使用。<br>只需按一個按鈕，你可以選擇任何可用的貓的聲音。你知道 - 你甚至不需要觸摸屏。剛剛滾動電話從左至右或任何其他側和貓的聲音將被改變。就這麼簡單！<br>這種貓的聲音的應用程序可以通過多種方式來使用：剛才聽到一個可愛和有趣的聲音，為樂趣，使笑話與您的朋友，對於教他們一個很好的方式玩你的寵物或者甚至提高你的心情。貓的聲音可以被設置為您的通話旋律。想要讓你的孩子快樂，讓他們笑 - 這個程序可以幫助你這一點。怎麼樣設置貓的聲音作為手機鈴聲。接到電話時，你會微笑每次。<br>特點貓的聲音：<br>* litzkrieg火烈鳥二戰黑猩猩阿努比斯的光環<br>*野牛tomcat的斯大林格勒惠斯勒衣架鼻子<br>*枕頭配件號啕大哭陌生人精簡版制服<br>*虫族像枕頭配件號啕大哭的聲音<br>*喵怒吼咕嚕懇求為貓咪在房間裡<br>那你的寵物嗎？貓的聲音的應用程序，可以兼具娛樂性和參與了他們。試想一下，有你的貓或狗會表現得聽到貓，他們看不到？他們會開始尋找那個或開始模仿同一個聲音也許他們會在其他方面採取行動？不要猶豫，試試這個應用程序，你會找到答案。讓你的寵物控制遊戲，通過改變貓，而移動電話的聲音。這是使用這種貓的聲音的應用程序多了一個途徑。此外，它可以幫助了解如何你的寵物會表現得滿足憤怒的貓的時候。這個應用程序可以給出一個答案，如果這是更好地避免這種情況。 class="description">  KABOOM鼓墊是一個虛擬鼓機和音序器，有很多的預緊力的鼓聲，這將有助於所有玩家鼓聲添加到他們的音樂。 KABOOM鼓墊配備了高品質的鼓採樣和出色的音質。 <br>每一個鼓點可以有一個介紹和環能部分，將打，直到你停止它。 <br>在音序器部分，你可以創建新的鼓聲或編輯現有的，然後將它們保存在設備的SD卡上。的鼓聲都保存在非常相似的鼓標籤，使他們能夠閱讀或編輯，甚至在任何文本編輯器應用程序的窗體的文本文件。 <br>KABOOM鼓墊可以讓你從60調整BPM到220，這將平穩甚至改變而鼓的節拍演奏。您可以選擇速度或只需輕按它就像在一個良好的節拍器應用程序。 <p>KABOOM鼓墊特點： <br>- 在各種音樂風格的7預裝的鼓聲 <br>- 從60到220 BPM速度設定 <br>- 4/4和3/4指標 <br>- 定序器與5首：大鼓，小鼓，騎，镲，美眉 <br>- 2至3中的定序器的水平動態 <br>- 添加/刪除吧 <br>- 建立新的鼓聲 <br>- 刪除鼓聲 <br>- 光滑和漂亮的用戶界面 "For The First Time" PianoPlay  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=FanFUN" title="FanFUN">FanFUN</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.fanfun.firsttimepianoplay"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS5mYW5mdW4uZmlyc3R0aW1lcGlhbm9wbGF5EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  FanFUN presents PianoPlay! A new way to play your favorite songs! This edition is inspired by Frozen's hit song, "For The First Time In Forever"!<p>HOW TO PLAY:<br>PianoPlay is addicting and easy to play! Simply tap on the black tiles, and avoid the white tiles. There are two game modes, timed and score. High scores are saved, so keep trying to improve your score! You can either rush through the song for the best score, or you can play at the melody and tempo of "For The First Time In Forever", so you can sing along with Anna and Elsa from Frozen!</p><p>FEATURES:<br>• Timed Mode - Quickly tap the black tiles to complete the song pattern!<br>• Score Mode - Tap as many black tiles as you can, as the speed increases!<br>• Lyrics - Now you can sing along while you play the piano melody!<br>• Leaderboards - Compete with other players to get the best score!<br>• Rate/Share - With your feedback and support, we can continue to improve our apps!</p><p>DISCLAIMER:<br>"For The First Time" PianoPlay is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by the makers of Frozen. This app does not include any copyrighted material. The piano melody is arranged with individual piano notes, and the rendition of this song is original and created by FanFUN. Drum Set Free Bateria Musical  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=CouldSys+Mobile" title="CouldSys Mobile">CouldSys Mobile</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="br.com.couldsys.drumsetfree"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJQojEiEKG2JyLmNvbS5jb3VsZHN5cy5kcnVtc2V0ZnJlZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Drum Set Free Bateria Musical - Novo aplicativo grátis em Android para tocar bateria no celular móvel, com tela de multi toque a onde qualquer pessoa se torna um musico profissional com esta bateria de dedo.<br>Contém vários tipos tipos de sons diferentes de bateria, para tornar este aplicativo o mais realista possível. Um verdadeiro Instrumento Musical de Bateria - (Drum Kit).<br>É suportado por todas as resoluções de tela - telefones e tablets (HD)<br>É possível gravar sua própria música tendo as teclas REC, STOP e PLAY ou utilizando o menu do seu Smartphone.<br>Também é possível ouvir a sua gravação, pode tocar músicas novas.<br>O Bateria Instrumento Musical conta com quatro cenários diferentes. Real Drum Kit, Simple Drum Kit, Electric Drum Pads e Real Drum Pads.<br>1-Real Drum Kit contém 14 pads de Bateria (2-Crash, 1-Splash, 4-Tom-Tom, 1-China, 1-H.H.Open, 1-H.H.Close, 2-Bass Kick, 1-Ride, 1-Snare); Todos com som verdadeiro de instrumento de bateria.<br>2-Simple Drum Kit é um cenário com com um pouco menos pads (12) de instrumentos musicais, mais com o mesmo som realista de uma bateria musical profissional.<br>3-Electric Drum Pads contém 12 pads com sons eletrônicos, podendo controlar o volume no próprio aplicativo e também controlar sua rotação, deixando mais rápido ou mais lento o som. Possui também um som para poder tocar no ritmo da musica.<br>4-Real Drum Pads é uma versão do real Drum Kit mais em forma de mesa de pads, com efeito ao tocar em cada pad, pode controlar o volume e a rotação dele também, inclusive gravar suas musicas que foram tocadas. Contém também um botão chamado SOUND 1 e SOUND 2, a onde pode alterar o som dos pads, mais mesmo assim continua sendo um som real de um instrumento de bateria musical.<br>O Drum Set Free Bateria Musical, é uma ótima maneira de passar o tempo!<br>Este aplicativo foi desenvolvido para bateristas, percussionistas, músicos, artistas e todos os públicos em geral que gosta de tocar bateria It debuted on television on April 3, 1971, and ran until February 10, 1973, airing on the Mainichi Broadcasting System and NET TV (now TV Asahi). The manga adaptation was also featured in Shōnen Magazine around the same period. The series has evolved into a franchise with many subsequent annual iterations. The cultural impact of the series in Japan resulted in astronomer Akimasa Nakamura naming two minor planets in honor of the series: 12408 Fujioka, after actor Hiroshi Fujioka, known for his portrayal href="/store/apps/details?id=com.simplemediagroup.tebaklagu" title="Tebak Lagu"> 270.    Tebak Lagu  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=SimpleMedia+Inc." title="SimpleMedia Inc.">SimpleMedia Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.simplemediagroup.tebaklagu"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS5zaW1wbGVtZWRpYWdyb3VwLnRlYmFrbGFndRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Tebak Lagu (Indonesia, Pop, Rock, Dangdut, Barat  atau Luar Negeri) merupakan permainan menebak lagu-lagu Indonesia baik pop, dangdut, rock, barat, maupun tembang lawas yang memiliki lebih dari 100 lagu hits dan akan terus bertambah setiap minggunya. Permainan ini memiliki keunikan tersendiri dan memiliki tantangan khusus bagi anda para pecinta musik.<p>Petunjuk Permainan:<br>- Permainan ini dibagi menjadi beberapa kategori<br>- Setiap kategori memiliki tingkatan/level<br>- Setiap level memiliki 4 step yakni (easy, medium, expert dan special)<br>- Step Easy, anda harus menebak 5 judul lagu dengan benar (minimal score: 350) - mendapatkan 5 koin.<br>- Step Medium, anda harus menebak 7 judul lagu dengan benar (minimal score: 560) - mendapatkan 5 koin.<br>- Step Expert, anda harus menebak 10 judul lagu dengan benar (minimal score: 900) - mendapatkan 5 koin.<br>- Step Special bisa dimainkan ataupun tidak, dikarenakan anda harus membayar dengan 10 koin untuk setiap memainkan step ini, dalam step ini anda menebak 10 judul lagu dengan benar dan mendapatkan 2 kali lipat nilai score (minimal score: 1850) - mendapatkan 30 koin. Step Special hanya sebagai bonus, tidak diwajibkan untuk dimainkan.<br>- Anda diberi waktu 10 detik untuk menjawab setiap lagu, setiap detik memiliki score tersendiri, semakin singkat waktu anda menjawab semakin banyak score yang anda miliki. Namun, jika anda menebak lebih dari 10 detik maka anda hanya memperoleh score 10 saja. Apabila anda salah menebak lagu, maka anda tidak mendapatkan score dan melanjutkan ke lagu berikutnya.<br>- Setiap Step terbuka apabila anda berhasil menyelesaikan step sebelumnya, begitu juga dengan level. Level berikutnya terbuka apabila anda berhasil menyelesaikan semua step (Easy, Medium, dan Expert)</p><p>NB:<br>*) Sebaiknya anda login terlebih dahulu agar nilai score anda tercatat dalam peringkat (Leaderboards) maupun Achievements<br>*) Kami akan selalu menambahkan level dan kategori. (Sementara terdapat kategori Pop dan Barat)</p><p>Apakah anda siap menjadi jawara dalam permainan ini?? 你的寶寶想有一個撥浪鼓的應用程序？好吧可以肯定的，那你剛才發現了市場上最好的之一。我們的寶貝車撥浪鼓應用程序將幫助您的寶寶通過在一個美麗的背景看不同的車學得更快。你的車咣應用程序可能會幫助寶寶建立自己的個人能力更快？好了，我們為你提供完美的動作。<p>撥浪鼓是最常見的嬰兒玩具在世界上。每個寶寶都需要有一個偉大的遊戲玩了，男孩，嘎嘎有自行車，火車，汽車等各類交通工具是最好的。也難怪孩子們愛McQueen和車輪 他們是完美的汽車玩具他們。</p><p>但也有可能是瞬間，當你沒有一個嬰兒玩具或嘎嘎附近給你，到那時，你將需要即興發揮。如果你有一個孩子的手機，下載這個嬰兒玩具應用程序，它實際上是一個撥浪鼓遊戲。</p><p>據了解，該幼兒視力發展在最初的幾個月裡，和觸覺和聲音對他們非常重要。這就是為什麼所有的嬰兒都有自己的玩具，汽車，魔方，飛機和其他類型的遊戲。這些玩具是他們的個人發展很重要，因為他們使他們覺得如何使用它們。所以，通過觀察不同的仿真器，玩具，火車，賽車，警察遊戲便開始體驗，他們周圍的世界是真實的。這是非常重要的，因為我們的應用程序，為您提供優美的環境，甚至7種不同類型的車輛：汽車，火車，自行車，船，汽車等。</p><p>另一件事，是我們的小奇蹟很重要的，就是聲音。他們正是讓他們在第一天的傻笑，所以它總是有一個孩子的玩具或遊戲，使他們周圍beuautful或有趣的聲音，如果他們在一個壞的mood.This獲得重要的是也是在我們的應用程序自帶的東西英寸除了漂亮的嘎嘎的聲音，這是打在循環，你的手機也將起到根據車輛的聲音，當他們點擊它們。例如，如果船被感動了，手機會播放聲音的船，如果SUV是觸控，手機會播放聲音的SUV，或者如果直升機被感動了，你的手機會播放聲音直升機。孩子們都愛這些孩子的玩具，他們肯定會傻笑時，他們將看到的響應。</p><p>響應也是小孩子很重要。這就是為什麼搖的效果之後更加激烈霍霍的聲音，並在此嬰兒玩具應用程序的所有圖紙萎縮gradualy而嬰兒搖晃手機。</p><p>我們的寶寶撥浪鼓的應用程序是真正偉大的人很少learnig，你絕對應該有它在你身邊，如果你會需要它。影響這個寶貝玩具飛機的應用程序，自行車，汽車，越野車，會對他們的發展的深刻和非常好的影響，作為一個有愛心的人，你應該總是嘗試給最好的東西為你的小寶寶。</p><p>產品特點：<br>*免費嬰兒搖鈴遊戲的聲音和搖晃的影響<br>*即使是8種不同的車輛，包括汽車，飛機，摩托車，直升機，火車，船，飛機。*每個汽車或其他車輛會發出聲音的不同的動畫每次它都會被竊聽<br>*非常美麗的城市背景下，這將滿足任何比賽和警車。<br>*非常漂亮的車一個偉大的嬰兒玩具的遊戲。<br>*為另一個孩子使用學步Impressingly容易。   HEX:99- Incredible Twitch Game  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=we.R.play" title="we.R.play">we.R.play</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.werplay.nine"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGgoYEhYKEGNvbS53ZXJwbGF5Lm5pbmUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  HEX:99 can be explained with a simple equation :<br>(simple controls + awesome music) x insane difficulty + frenzied action = SUPER ADDICTIVE ACTION.<p>HEX:99 is an incredibly simple, yet incredibly challenging action game. It is accessible due to the simple controls, awesome music and beautiful, vivid visuals. The challenge level is high but infinitely rewarding for those who master HEX:99. </p><p>--- GAME OVER ---</p><p>Hex:99 is fast, minimal and fun. It pulses with great music and challenging thrills. It is a thrilling, super-charged action game where you will always be failing to not die (which means you will be dying very often). </p><p>--- FINITE DISTANCE, INFINITE CHALLENGE ---</p><p>Hex:99 is not an endless action game. There are checkpoints and zones that can be unlocked. Only about 3% that start the game will ever reach the end. Fancy your reflexes and twitch based gameplay skills? To get there requires lightning fast reflexes, monstrous patience and unwavering persistence (and just a little bit of chalk). </p><p>--- THE REAL CHALLENGE IS WITHIN ---</p><p>HEX:99 is about pushing your own feeble reflexes to the next level. It's about using the simple drag to move controls and syncing them with your brain in unison. Play without blinking, move without thinking and you just might fly without sinking.</p><p>--- JUST ONE MORE... ---</p><p>HEX:99 is hypnotic and addictive. A lethal combination that spells doom for your free time. HEX:99 will chew up your free time one difficult yet satisfying run at a time. Its one super fast twitch-controlled run after another till you reach 1999 .... or sleep trying.   </p><p>--- SIMPLE IS BEAUTIFUL ---</p><p>Vibrant colors, hypnotic graphics and thumping music are combined artfully in an elegant package. It is minimal, it is simple, it is gorgeous. </p><p>To quote Cold Play - "Nobody said it was easy. No one ever said it would be this hard." - Well we're telling you that this game will be THAT HARD!</p><p>Play &amp; let <br>以提供當按下箭頭圖示時,基底音符的改變順序.</p><p>-點選頂端的和弦名稱可以選擇不同難度的和弦,<br>目前可以選擇 maj7,m7 ,dom7,dom7#5 ,m7b5 , dim7共六種和弦.</p><p>-網格左上方有個升降的符號,<br>按下後可以置換成升記號#或降記號b<br>以改變基底音符,例如從 Eb 變成 D#</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Complete Ear Trainer  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Binary+Guilt+Software" title="Binary Guilt Software">Binary Guilt Software</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.binaryguilt.completeeartrainer"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKImNvbS5iaW5hcnlndWlsdC5jb21wbGV0ZWVhcnRyYWluZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The ultimate ear training app for musicians. Develop your relative pitch to the full by improving your aural skills and your music theory knowledge. This will better many aspects of your life as a musician, be it regarding improvisation, composition, arrangement, interpretation, singing, or playing in a band. Designed like a video game and with strong pedagogical concepts in mind, this app will make you truly master each interval, chord, scale, etc. before taking you to the next one.<p><br>9.5/10 "One of the best music focused apps. Ever. This is as close to a perfectly done Android app as you can find. Every musician should have this." - Joe Hindy, Android Authority -</p><p><br>Features</p><p>• 150+ progressive drills arranged over 4 levels / 28 chapters<br>• 11 drill types, 24 intervals, 36 chord types, chord inversions, 16 scale types, melodic dictations, chord progressions<br>• NEW: play a selection of 21 drills in arcade mode<br>• 5 octaves of actual recorded piano sounds<br>• NEW: 5 octaves of actual recorded electric guitar sounds (optional in-app purchase)<br>• In each chapter, a theory card will introduce you to the concepts you will need to know<br>• No need to know how to read music on a staff<br>• Designed like a video game: earn 3 stars in each drill of a chapter to unlock the next one. Or will you be able to obtain 5-star perfects?<br>• Compare scores amongst your friend circles and see how you rank against other players worldwide<br>• Don't want to follow the preestablished path of progression? Create and save your own custom drills and rehearse them at your own convenience<br>• Never lose any progress: cloud sync across your various Android and iOS devices<br>• Google Play Game Services: 23 achievements to unlock<br>• Google Play Game Services: leaderboards (global, per level, per chapter, arcade mode)<br>• Nice and clean card-based user interface<br>• Designed by a musician and music teacher with a Royal Conservatory master's degree</p><p><br>Full Version</p><p>• Download the app and try out the first chapter for free<br>• One-time in-app purchase of $2.99 to unlock the full version on all your Android devices</p><p><br>Having a problem? TV Series, show just how well you know the music from your favorite series and tries to decipher the huge library of tv programs as well as its music that we've put together for you, challenge your friends and shows that you are the best. (MTF!) TV Series, is available in multiple languages for the convenience of the users with unique features such as the multiplayer mode, which is very versatile because it can be used for two players or up to four players, either for a mobile or a Tablet.<br> <br>The multiplayer mode that does not require connection to the internet, is the following: when you start the game starts playing a melody and the first player to tighten the button that corresponds, wins the shift to answer, (the more time passes, fewer stars or points can be earned by each song), but if the player that played first you make a mistake, the second player has the opportunity to answer and to get it right. At the time of correctly guessing the anthem, you could be shown on a map the country of origin, as well as its flag and you will be able to play it again to get a better learning of this hymn and its country.<br> <br>The interface is friendly, clear and attractive because it allows them to users of any level feel safe when it comes to choosing your game mode, and if they want to go back to the main menu can do so with freedom and speed by the speed of the application. Rex Dinosaur Roar 3D Piano"> 338.    T. Rex Dinosaur Roar 3D Piano  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=T-Racing+Games" title="T-Racing Games">T-Racing Games</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.tracinggames.trexpiano"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS50cmFjaW5nZ2FtZXMudHJleHBpYW5vEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Tap and hold these animated realistic 3D tyrannosaurus rexes and play music. You can strike a chord of up to five t. rexes.<p>They move their tails, open their toothy mouths and emit loud scary prehistoric roars. Each dinosaur corresponds to a piano key with realistic pitch intervals.</p><p>Thus, you can play as if you were playing the piano. But t. rexes are much cooler and scarier. You should hear it!</p><p>Permissions are required for standard ad systems only in order not to show you the ads too often, the game does not collect or use your data. Interstitial ads are relevant and non-intrusive, displayed at the beginning, then you can play without popups.</p><p>A piece of info on tyrannosaurus rex from Wikipedia:</p><p>"Tyrannosaurus means "tyrant lizard," from Greek tyrannos which means "tyrant," and sauros which means "lizard") is a genus of coelurosaurian theropod dinosaur. The species Tyrannosaurus rex (rex meaning "king" in Latin), commonly abbreviated to T. rex, is a fixture in popular culture. The T. rex lived throughout what is now western North America, which then was an island continent named Laramidia. Tyrannosaurus had a much wider range than other tyrannosaurids. Fossils are found in a variety of rock formations dating to the Maastrichtian age of the upper Cretaceous Period, 67 to 66 million years ago. It was among the last non-avian dinosaurs to exist before the Cretaceous–Paleogene extinction event.</p><p>Like other tyrannosaurids, Tyrannosaurus was a bipedal carnivore with a massive skull balanced by a long, heavy tail. Relative to its large and powerful hind limbs, Tyrannosaurus fore limbs were short but unusually powerful for their size and had two clawed digits. Although other theropods rivaled or exceeded Tyrannosaurus rex in size, it was the largest known tyrannosaurid and one of the largest known land predators. In fact, the most complete specimen measures up to 12.3 m (40 ft) in length, up to 4 metres (13 ft) tall at the hips,and up to 6.8 metric tons (7.5 short tons) in weight. By far the largest carnivore in its environment, Tyrannosaurus rex may have been an apex predator, preying upon hadrosaurs, ceratopsians, and possibly sauropods, although some experts have suggested the dinosaur was primarily a scavenger. The debate about whether Tyrannosaurus was an apex predator or scavenger was among the longest ongoing feud in paleontology; however, most scientists now agree that Tyrannosaurus rex was an opportunistic carnivore, both acting as a predator and scavenging.</p><p>More than 50 specimens of Tyrannosaurus rex have been identified, some of which are nearly complete skeletons".</p><p>(c) http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tyrannosaurus</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" 下載農場佐賀並獲得農場的故事傳奇故事催眠曲你的自我，直到你到達夢想的土地。<br>大概所有的父母會同意讓你的寶寶睡覺可能是相當艱鉅的任務。如果你不喜歡唱歌這可能是連難，不知道多少漂亮的搖籃曲的旋律，或只是太累了一個長期的工作一天後唱。或者，也許你或你的寶寶耳鳴或發脾氣受到影響。幸運的是現代技術可以為你提供很大的幫助在這種情況下。通過您的智能手機玩農場甜蜜搖籃曲的旋律和幫助寶寶入睡從容，圍繞著舒緩的睡眠與自然的聲音。沒有壓力，只是冷靜，與大自然混優美的音樂旋律的聲音。<p>該農場搖籃曲應用程序有一個豐富多彩的農場背景和裝飾。和孩子做喜歡的農場動物，如牛豬狗貓馬小馬。男生一定會喜歡拖拉機，女孩享受農家童話故事。試想一下，美麗的一天​​，綠色農產品威樂，綠草和樹木，乾草的味道，輕鬆的動物在農田中，羊羔毛的柔軟度，新鮮牛奶的味道。也玩養殖的喜悅：收穫季作物拖拉機，乾草一天，撿漿果在附近的森林，看著走在某處附近收盤，馴服野馬的駝鹿，看著從你的農場家的窗口雨。同時，我們也不能忘記的多個農場的故事與動物為主角。他們談，工作，一起玩，創造一個美麗的，有趣和神奇的農場生活。</p><p>請參見下面的使用這個應用程序的一些有趣的建議和想法：<br>*農場的故事傳奇搖籃曲<br>*搖籃曲的牛仔和牛仔女郎<br>*綠色織補農場威樂搖籃曲<br>*良好的夜間睡眠農場的旋律<br>*我的小農場的故事<br>*牛睡，自然的聲音搖籃曲的放鬆氛圍<br>*農場童話故事搖籃曲<br>*小的小羊羔農場一天的故事<br>*搖籃曲的農用拖拉機和他的朋友<br>*困馬和他的朋友們<br>*農場的故事傳奇的townfalk<br>*農場英雄工藝和搖籃曲<br>*農場的朋友唱搖籃曲</p><p>與寶寶建立自己的農場生活的故事，同時準備睡覺。發揮短農場遊戲，放鬆心情，花一些時間與您的孩子。孩子們一定會喜歡它！<br>即使是短期的遊戲和故事可以幫助孩子放鬆。因此，這個程序是完美的小孩：男孩和女孩，誰是喜歡農場的生活。和它的美麗旋律催眠曲伴隨著大自然的聲音將推動你或你的寶寶放鬆和平靜中入睡。睡眠將不會是一個艱鉅的任務了。</p><p>這個程序也是提升孩子的幻想和創造力的完美工具。而除了它會環繞你一個自然，會提醒你的日子裡，當你的父母晚上睡覺前唱歌給你美麗的搖籃曲。由於現代技術是很容易今天。只要下載這個農場催眠曲應用程序和你的寶寶會睡著，而玩他/她自己的農場的故事。</p><p>此應用程序是非常適合大家讓自己平靜，並獲得了夢鄉。非常簡單的用戶界面，而且它是免費的在你的Andr​​oid智能手機進行下載。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> This edition features hit POP songs, from amazing singers such as Taylor Swift, One Direction, and Ariana Grande!<p>PIANOPLAY: POP MIX 1 SONG LIST:<br>"Shake It Off" by Taylor Swift<br>"Steal My Girl" by One Direction<br>"Break Free" by Ariana Grande<br>"Stay With Me" by Sam Smith<br>"Rude" by Magic</p><p>HOW TO PLAY:<br>PianoPlay is addicting and easy to play! Quickly tap on the black piano tiles, and avoid the white tiles to complete the song pattern! Don't forget to enter your name so your high scores can be saved automatically. Check the Leaderboards to compete with other fans! You can either rush through the song for the best score, or you can play at the melody and tempo of the song, so you can sing along with the lyrics!</p><p>FEEDBACK:<br>Feel free to email us song requests, issues, comments, and suggestions! With your feedback and support, we can add more songs and continue to improve our apps!</p><p>DISCLAIMER:<br>PianoPlay: POP Mix 1 is an unofficial fan application. The piano melodies are arranged with individual piano notes, and the renditions of these songs are original and created by FanFUN. <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="Xylophone" class="cover-image" data-cover-large="https://lh4.ggpht.com/ZgzdcvCucBTOGk7rAmkfx9XqFRGWvnsuysIGKrh-Gy4bGZOuG8am0LvXJWPGDXEVFOQ=w340-rw" data-cover-small="https://lh4.ggpht.com/ZgzdcvCucBTOGk7rAmkfx9XqFRGWvnsuysIGKrh-Gy4bGZOuG8am0LvXJWPGDXEVFOQ=w170-rw" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.deepakpk.xylophone" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.deepakpk.xylophone" title="Xylophone"> 356.    Xylophone  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Deepak+PK" title="Deepak PK">Deepak PK</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.deepakpk.xylophone"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS5kZWVwYWtway54eWxvcGhvbmUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The xylophone (from the Greek words xylon, "wood" + phōnē, "sound, voice", meaning "wooden sound") is a musical instrument in the percussion family that consists of wooden bars struck by mallets. Each bar is an idiophone tuned to a pitch of a musical scale, whether pentatonic or heptatonic in the case of many African and Asian instruments, diatonic in many western children's instruments, or chromatic for orchestral use.<p>The term xylophone may be used generally, to include all such instruments, such as the marimba, balafon and even the semantron. However, in the orchestra, the term xylophone refers specifically to a chromatic instrument of somewhat higher pitch range and drier timbre than the marimba, and these two instruments should not be confused.</p><p>The term is also popularly used to refer to similar instruments of the lithophone and metallophone types. For example, the Pixiphone and many similar toys described by the makers as xylophones have bars of metal rather than of wood, and so are in organology regarded as a glockenspiels rather than as xylophones. This misnomer was also popularised by the Sooty show, in which the metal-barred instrument he plays is always described as a xylophone.</p><p>Application developed by: Deepak PK<br>Email : deepakpk009@yahoo.in<br>Website: deepakpk.com<br> <br>Images by: Sibin Eldo<br>Email: sibin.eldo@gmail.com<br>Website: sibineldo.blogspot.in</p><p>Keywords: xylophone, instrument, music.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.deepakpk.xylophone" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> href="/store/apps/details?id=com.fanfun.breakfreepianoplay" title="&quot;Break Free&quot; PianoPlay"> 361.    "Break Free" PianoPlay  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=FanFUN" title="FanFUN">FanFUN</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.fanfun.breakfreepianoplay"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS5mYW5mdW4uYnJlYWtmcmVlcGlhbm9wbGF5EAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  FanFUN presents PianoPlay! A new way to play your favorite songs! This edition is inspired by Ariana Grande's hit song, "Break Free"!<p>HOW TO PLAY:<br>PianoPlay is addicting and easy to play! Simply tap on the black tiles, and avoid the white tiles. There are two game modes, timed and score. High scores are saved, so keep trying to improve your score! You can either rush through the song for the best score, or you can play at the melody and tempo of "Break Free", so you can sing along with Ariana Grande!</p><p>FEATURES:<br>• Timed Mode - Quickly tap the black tiles to complete the song pattern!<br>• Score Mode - Tap as many black tiles as you can, as the speed increases!<br>• Lyrics - Now you can sing along while you play the piano melody!<br>• High Scores - Scores are saved locally! Leaderboards coming soon!<br>• Support Chat - Post questions, comments, and song requests to our support chat!<br>• Rate/Share - With your feedback and support, we can continue to improve our apps!</p><p>DISCLAIMER:<br>"Break Free" PianoPlay is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Ariana Grande, or her record label.. This app does not include any copyrighted material. The piano melody is arranged with individual piano notes, and the rendition of this song is original and created by FanFUN. If you enjoy this app, please support the developers by purchasing the full version.</p><p>Designed for ages 2 and up, these games help your children learn popular songs while interacting in a fun and creative way. </p><p>***Old MacDonald Had A Farm***<br>Play with 18 animals, including typical farm animals such as a cow, horse, pig and sheep, and non-typical farm animals such as an alligator, frog, lion and snake. Choose an animal for each verse, and interact with the farm!</p><p>***Five Little Ducks***<br>This counting song has five cute ducklings that love to play! As the song progresses, the ducklings get fewer and fewer in number until there are none left and mama duck has to go find them. Watch and interact with the ducks as they fly around and play in the water. See if you can tap the butterfly!</p><p>***Five Little Speckled Frogs***<br>A counting song that features five unique frogs that love to eat bugs - and there is an endless supply of bugs! As the song progresses, the frogs jump in the water until there are none left. Tap on the bugs to eat them, move the frogs around, touch the sailboats, and more!</p><p>***Mary Had A Little Lamb***<br>A classic song that is often a first for children. This song features Mary, her lamb, four verses and a world that builds as the song progresses. Make it snow and make it green, ring the school bell, play with the school children, pick apples, and more!</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a CNA 360 - Sing The Chorus (EN)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Editora+CNA" title="Editora CNA">Editora CNA</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.playerum.singthechorusingles"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKgooEiYKIGNvbS5wbGF5ZXJ1bS5zaW5ndGhlY2hvcnVzaW5nbGVzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Você ouve o refrão de uma música e lê parte desse refrão, junto com opções para completar o que falta. href="/store/apps/details?id=air.toymiles.animalorchestra.fs.es" title="Orquesta de animales"> 412.    Orquesta de animales  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=devmiles" title="devmiles">devmiles</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.toymiles.animalorchestra.fs.es"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKImFpci50b3ltaWxlcy5hbmltYWxvcmNoZXN0cmEuZnMuZXMQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Una forma divertida con la que los niños aprenderán los instrumentos musicales.<p>Esta es una versión con publicidad de Orquesta Animal, un juego de música para niños.<br>Orquesta de Animales es un juego musical educativo para niños en edad preescolar que les enseñará a distinguir los instrumentos musicales. La mayoría de juegos educativos para niños se centran en enseñar los números, las formas, a leer, a contar y a aprender otras lecciones obligatorias. Nosotros creemos que los juegos educativos para niños no deberían limitarse a lo que es obligatorio. Es por esta razón que hemos creado Orquesta de Animales - un juego de música para niños que va más allá de la educación general en sí. Orquesta de Animales es el primer juego de música para niños que les permitirá aprender los nombres de los instrumentos musicales, a la vez que los reconocen por sus sonidos.</p><p>El juego es muy simple - los niños escucharán el sonido de un instrumento musical, o verán escrito su nombre, y tendrán que encontrar en la pantalla a un animal con ese instrumento. Tras seleccionarlo, el animal realizará un breve sonido y el niño pasará a la siguiente fase.</p><p>★ ★ ★ ¿Qué aprenderán mis hijos? ★ ★ ★<br>Su hijo aprenderá los nombres de los instrumentos musicales y sus sonidos. Su hijo aumentará el interés por la música mientras juega con los animales tan bonitos y divertidos de este juego. Muy pronto verá cómo su hijo empieza a distinguir y a reconocer los instrumentos musicales en el mundo real – que es el factor más importante del juego.</p><p></p><p></p> <span href="/store/apps/details?id=air.toymiles.animalorchestra.fs.en" title="動物樂團"> 413.    動物樂團  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=devmiles" title="devmiles">devmiles</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.toymiles.animalorchestra.fs.en"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKImFpci50b3ltaWxlcy5hbmltYWxvcmNoZXN0cmEuZnMuZW4QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  “動物樂團，一個美麗的教育遊戲從幼兒園的孩子” - Appszoom.com<br>“15分鐘後這些應用程序之一，我4歲的花了一天的休息喊她在電台歌曲公認的文書的名稱。” - Parentmap.com<p>可愛的動物，精彩圖片，20餘儀器去了解！<br>動物樂團是為孩子們學習樂器一個偉大而有趣的方式。</p><p>動物樂團是一個教育的音樂遊戲，學齡前兒童和幼兒園歲的孩子。大多數兒童教育遊戲會教你的孩子字母，數字，形狀，閱讀，計算等硬性的東西。我們認為，學齡前兒童和孩子們的教育遊戲不得限制到什麼是強制性的。這就是為什麼我們創建了動物樂團 - 音樂遊戲的孩子超出一般孩子的教育。動物樂團是第一個音樂遊戲的孩子，讓與樂器你的孩子玩耍，學習他們的名字和他們的聲音認出他們。</p><p>遊戲玩法很簡單 - 幼兒會聆聽樂器聲音或它的名字，並試圖找到與屏幕上的該文書的動物。一旦選擇，動物會起到短期的旋律，進入下一個問題。</p><p>什麼將我的孩子學習？<br>你的孩子將學習樂器及聲音的名字。你的孩子，而與可愛和滑稽的動物在玩遊戲會增加對音樂的興趣。你會很快看到你的孩子開始注意到並承認樂器在現實世界中 - 這就是激發我們最關心的比賽。</p><p>模式<br>玩 - 試圖通過它的聲音或名稱識別樂器。<br>學習 - 聽樂器的聲音和名字。</p><p>有超過20個動物和樂器在遊戲中：<br>鱷魚薩克斯，大象鈸，長頸鹿鋼琴，甲魚與口琴，小貓長笛，羊風笛，包涵巴拉萊卡，獅子與電吉他，狼與吉他，山羊panflute，狐狸與小提琴，公牛與低音提琴和許多更多。</p><p>動物樂團。這是一個偉大的學習音樂遊戲為學齡前兒童。不像其他的益智遊戲動物樂團並不試圖教你的孩子字母和數字。相反，它讓幼兒熟悉的樂器。你的孩子將學習樂器的名稱，並承認他們用自己的聲音。本場比賽是很簡單的讓孩子沒有任何幫助，發揮也足以互動，讓他們專注。孩子們會聽樂器的聲音，或它的名字，並試圖找到與屏幕上的該文書的動物。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Try to keep your energy before the music ends. PRESS YOUR HAND ON I-SHIRT TO USE MANA AND RESTORE ENERGY !</p><p>Dance or play games with Santa and Santa Girl while the app auto-takes screenshots of you and the Santas which you can share afterwards.</p><p>ABOUT i-SHIRTS:</p><p>You will need ARPrintables "Dance With Santa" i-shirts to play the games. Go to http://www.zazzle.com/arprintables to get your i-shirts. Or go to arprintables.etsy.com or arprintables.com to get the images for printing your own t-shirt. You can buy i-shirts at www.tisho.com/dukkan/arp_5655 if you are in Turkey.</p><p>Even without the i-shirt, you can have the app take fun pictures of you and your friends dancing with Santa or Santa Girl and share them online afterwards.</p><p>Your automatically taken pictures will be stored into `gallery` under folder `Dance With Santa` which will also be created automatically.</p><p>Please remember to delete the pictures you will not need for the app does not override the images.</p><p>MODES: </p><p>All the modes present auto-screenshot feature.</p><p>1- Dance with Santa : Auto record, does NOT require i-shirts, two dance styles available: Street Dance and Oriental (Belly) Dance</p><p>2- Dance with Santa Girl : Auto record, does NOT require i-shirts, two dance styles available: Street Dance and Oriental (Belly) Dance</p><p>3- Play the Game: REQUIRES i-shirt to control "SantaGirl" positional movements and use MANA</p><p>4- TWO PLAYERS: REQUIRES i-shirt (to control Santa Girl) and the image (to control Santa) downloadable for free from arprintables.com. This time one of the players will control Santa and try to hit Santa Girl to drop her energy down. Player controlling Santa Girl, should be on the RIGHT side of the other player.</p><p> WARNING: </p><p>Place your device on a stand designed for your device. Adjust it to the position where your device will be at a most perpendicular angle to the ground.</p><p>The app uses the front camera of your device. You should place your tablet/phone so that the image on your i-shirt can clearly be seen by the front cam.</p><p>Please make sure the room is lighted sufficiently.</p><p>The distance between your device and you depends on your gaming strategies. However, you should always remember that the camera should focus in order for the tracking to work.</p><p>Since the app depends on the FRONT CAMERA of your device for image recognition and tracking, you have to keep a distance (1m. -2.5m.) from your device to be able to play the app.<br> <br>You may not be able to view your screen clearly from that distance if you are running the app on an android Phone. For this reason it is STRONGLY RECOMMENDED that you connect your device to a TV or projection screen.</p><p>Please be WARNED that you should pay attention to the distance between you and your opponent when playing in TWO PLAYERS mode NOT TO HIT one another. Always keep a safe this distance from things or people in your physical environment. </p><p>You should almost always come to a closer proximity to the front camera when using your MANA. Do not be anxious if the camera loses track of you: You have 5 seconds to return to the camera's field of view before you lose some of your energy.</p><p>Female figure might distort the image printed on the i-shirt which might effect the user experience.</p><p><br>TERMS, CONDITIONS AND RESPONSIBILITY:</p><p>The developer cannot be hold responsible for<br>-for other usage extending the sole purpose of having fun,<br>-your actions of taking pictures of others against their will or without their acknowledgement.<br>-for any injury or harm you cause yourself, your surroundings or any other person while playing this game.  <br>-for the quality of i-shirts of which he is only delivering designs. Visual feedback for touch on bars (using a mallet).<br>* Classic and Level game modes. Two difficulty levels to ensure longevity. Each match is new and different!<br>* Reverber option.<br>* Record and re-play your composition.<br>* Option to show note’s names (with multi-language support).<br>* Solo play feature. Let your Android device express its own creativity composing a melody...<br>* Beautiful graphic in HD.<br>* Playable for everybody and anybody! Really fun for all ages! The ideal drum app for your kids or toddlers band / orchestra…<br>* Do you have additional features/improvements to suggest for the next update? class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=tr.com.alyaka.alper.steeltonguedrum" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=tr.com.alyaka.alper.steeltonguedrum" title="Steel Tongue Drum"> 454.    Steel Tongue Drum  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Alyaka" title="Alyaka">Alyaka</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="tr.com.alyaka.alper.steeltonguedrum"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLQorEikKI3RyLmNvbS5hbHlha2EuYWxwZXIuc3RlZWx0b25ndWVkcnVtEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  A steel tongue drum is made from an empty (often 20 lb) propane tank. The tank is flipped over, the base cut/knocked off; and seven to eleven tongues are cut radially into the bottom of the tank, forming the top of the instrument. The tongues can be tuned by the player by varying the length of the cuts. The steel tongue drum is often tuned to pentatonic scales but can be tuned to the diatonic scale, the chromatic scale, or any set of notes the maker chooses. The instrument is played with the fingers or with mallets. (Wikipedia)<p>You  can play now in Android Devices free.</p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=tr.com.alyaka.alper.steeltonguedrum" Low Latency  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=fethawit" title="fethawit">fethawit</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="featherdev.lowlatency.android"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWZlYXRoZXJkZXYubG93bGF0ZW5jeS5hbmRyb2lkEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Low Latency is a rhythm game in the flavor of osu! that employs computational signal processing in place of handmade beatmaps, allowing you to play any music you have on your device.<p>Low Latency features:<br>- advanced signal analysis techniques<br>- non-deterministic gameplay<br>- a light show driven by your music<br>- a full-screen visualizer mode<br>- no ads<br>- no social networking cruft<br>- support for MP3 and Ogg Vorbis</p><p>Whether you're looking for a challenging rhythm game or just want something to play while you listen to your favorite music, Low Latency has you covered.</p><p>Please note that loading times will vary greatly depending on the length of your music, the quality, and the processing capabilities of your device. Devices that have floating point hardware and modern processors will perform better.</p><p>Only 44.1 kHz supported presently. If you are getting crashes loading certain audio files, odds are they're using a different sample rate.</p><p>This game is open source.<br>https://github.com/v4lk/lowlatency</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=T-Racing+Games" title="T-Racing Games">T-Racing Games</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span
